title: Journalism under Digital Siege
body_lines: The South Asian Celebration of World Press Freedom Day 2022 was held at the Bandaranaike International Memorial Conferance Hall (BMICH) under the theme "Journalism under Digital Siege" today. The key note address was held by Ms. Namini Wijedasa - Deputy Editor (Investigations) of SundayTimes. The program was organised by UNESCO and the European Union. Pix by Kithsiri de Mel
